text: Tamen wangshuo:“Zhexie shengchu he guwu shi jinwu, wei women zhunxu zhe cai keyi chi.”[Tamen hai wangyan] youxie shengchu shi jinzhi yunzai de, youxie shengchu shi buxu nian an la zhi ming er zai de. Zhe wanquan shi jie an la de mingyi niezao huangyan. Ta [an la] jiang yin tamen suo niezao de huangyan er huan bao tamen.
